---
title: "Contributing"
description: |
  How you can help build FTOL
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

FTOL is a community-driven project. Contributions are welcome!

Please do let us know if something in the tree appears to need correction.

The best way to make a contribution is to [file an issue on the FTOL github repo](https://github.com/fernphy/ftol/issues/).
